Reviews.Title: Not as advertised but decent button vid cam
Reviews.Author: N. E. Spencer

} cv_mo1273564PZ0K6Vpreplay.onmouseout = function() { cv_mo1273564PZ0K6Vpreplay.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/91r1F-VGrgS._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; } var node = cv_mo1273564PZ0K6Vpreplay.parentNode; var cv_mo1273564PZ0K6VcurrentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo1273564PZ0K6VcurrentClick) { return cv_mo1273564PZ0K6VcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 2:30 MinsI bought the button camera advertised here. It's not bad... Except... it is NOT as advertised. Otherwise I'd probably give it four stars.See sample footage from actual cam in my video review.Pros:-It is actually slimmer than shown in the advertising photos (see photos in my video review)-It has a reset hole so if it ever stops working, you can fix it with a paper clip.-It actually records fairly sharp video and audio, it adapts to different lighting situations, and actually records amazingly well IMHO.Cons: It is not as advertised:-It has no user-removable Micro SD card (maybe if you rip it open, but I'm not going to try. It has no Micro SD card slot on the outside).-No large flat front buttons as depicted; instead one very small fragile power/record button on the back side. See video review.-It seems to be getting off-time very rapidly: in about one hour of putting this review together, it's gotten off by about four minutes. One or two minutes off I could see, because I didn't set it to the exact second. But four minutes off? That's not user error (i.e. not my bad). Other mini-vid cams I have are pretty accurate on keeping time.-Blue LED glows during recording (you could put black tape over it I guess).-Button hole is off-center from the video sensor, and as a result you see the shadow around the video recording (your mileage may vary. I.e. it might be more centered on your unit, or you could razor the button off and recenter it with superglue. But this is a brand new unit... why should you have to 'fix' it?!I will be returning it because I wanted removable memory. shucks.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice and affordable
Reviews.Author: RY
Reviews.Content: I have this item early than the expected arrival, I thought it is not working and I apologize to the company who sent it. It was my old USB hub that is not working properly.  I connect in other USB hub and it is working now and it install the driver very fast. I look on its recorded video very nice too, my room has a poor lighting so its a little bit blurry but I am satisfy thought I have poor lighting in my room you can see the face clearly.  If you have a good lighting in your room it is clear as HD. I AM SATISFIED. THANKS

Reviews.Title: This partially functional chinese button camera comes with a trojan, a cool magnetic ring, and hilariously useless instructions.
Reviews.Author: Bradley Wayne Tarbutton "Bradel"
Reviews.Content: The first thing I did when I plugged this thing in was scan it for viruses.  Avast flagged an EXE file as a trojan in a hidden folder named "RECYCLER".  The only non hidden folder on the device was labeled "MUSIC", and I found some weird audio track in music/dj/dj.  The videos and pictures I had recorded were in folders labeled "IMAGE" and "VIDEO" respectively.  These folders were not visible even after enabling "view hidden folders" in windows.  I had to figure out the names of these folders by watching the files that were being scanned by avast when I re-ran the scan.  The instruction sheet that came with it is a joke, albeit a funny one.  The scale and frequency of grammatical errors makes it hilariously impossible to derive any useful information from the instructions.If you're tech savvy enough to dodge the trojan and find the video files on this thing, it serves its purpose.  The magnetic ring activation is really cool.  Touch it briefly to turn it on and start/stop recording, hold it for 1 second to turn it off.  All the pictures I have taken so far have been very blurry but the video was of acceptable quality.  I haven't used it long enough to comment on battery life.

Reviews.Title: mini spy camera
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: It is a good camera at a great price but you do get what you pay for. The instructions were so badly translated the were impossible to understand. I had to go on youtube and find a clip of how to operate it.

Reviews.Title: Too bad the instruction manual is poor
Reviews.Author: Kenneth "YotaruVegeta"
Reviews.Content: I had a rough time with what turns out to be a good product. The instruction manual is written in poorly constructed sentences, and I was under the impression that I needed a CD with drivers to connect to my computer. What you need is an SD card (specifically called a TF card in the instructions) and you will be able to connect to a PC. How would you know that off the bat? You wouldn't! It doesn't come with a card, so you'd be stuck until you figured it out.Another tip: the red light is actually supposed to be off when recording, not on. Again, that's hard to know when reading the English instructions.

Reviews.Title: Works great right out of the box (instructions)
Reviews.Author: G-Man
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to put it on my RC planes.  Item arrived before due date.  I took it out of the box and charged it with the supplied USB cord.  I adjusted the date and time on the supplied SD card.  There is a TEXT file, open it, make changes to the date and time and save. I then tried it out.  You turn it on using the power button, then to record video you hold down the play button until the LED begins to flash, let go of the button, the light goes out and is recording.  To stop recording you push the play button again and the light turns on.  I then turned it off using the power button.  Took out the card put it in my computer's card reader, windows 7 opened the folder automatically, I clicked on the "record" folder and my movies were there.  Simple.

Reviews.Title: Arrived early but IT DOESN'T WORK - Don't waste your time & money ! You've been warned !
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: Excited to get this. Arrived early, only to be disappointed because it doesn't work. I search the web for instructions as the manual is in Chinese and VERY BAD ENGLISH translation (Google translation is better than this manual).I browsed the web also. But still the device just defective, I guess. Sucks tough !IN PROCESS FOR RETURNING IT.Also I paid more than the market price around $15, I paid $20 plus S&H.;The Spy Pen is more expensive ($100) but at least it works well and smooth connection with your laptop / computer.

Reviews.Title: Button Cam
Reviews.Author: MicroBoss
Reviews.Content: I thought this was a joke when I bought it.  Took a little trial and error to understand the vibration sequences but I can't help but be impressed at the video quality and ease of use - it's pretty inconspicuous and stealthy.

Reviews.Title: super useful tool.
Reviews.Author: luis naula
Reviews.Content: This item works good little difficult to use but ones you understand it is nice good cuality nice pictures ......

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: ken poggensee
Reviews.Content: I used these for Remote control quadcopters and airplane and worked great. Not HD, but took some awesome arial videos. For the price, you can't go wrong

Reviews.Title: Excellent gadget
Reviews.Author: Adrian Alanis
Reviews.Content: For the price it's a good mini spy camera!!!  works perfect with the ring,i really liked this purchase,don't expect a excellent quality video.

Reviews.Title: Its OK, Nothing to brag about but functional.
Reviews.Author: HotSpringsPark
Reviews.Content: Arrived much earlier than promised. This item is shipped from Japan. The video is what one would expect from a very tiny camera; shaky even at the least bit of movement. The sound is very good. The biggest problem I had is the instructions are,(seriously)absolutely,virtually worthless. Written in English, yes, but written by a Japanese fella who may read English but doesn't understand English. I have to figure out the operation of the camera on my own. Plug in USB, download driver into computer. Charge the unit on your computer with the USB cable provided. I don't know how long it will run on a charge. For $20 or so, just a fun little gadget.

Reviews.Title: Another Pile of Crap from China.
Reviews.Author: Rick Bennette "Rick Bennette"
Reviews.Content: First of all, the Chinese need to take the effort to write instructions that make sense in English if they intend to sell thier products here. Failing to do so crimps their sales. Here is what they say to get into the video mode, and I quote, "Video mode: Start Recording: short shock machine 2, red light flashes two times, lights off."Does this actually mean anything comprehensible in English?Since this recorder is capable of recording photos, audio clips or video clips all using only two butttons and one light, it makes for a great deal of confusion as to what mode the device is in.I still haven't figured out how to get into record mode when I want.Following these cryptic instructions, I've managed to take a few fuzzy stills and make a few short audio recordings. By accident, I got into the video mode one time, so I know the device works even though I was unawre it was recording. The video is 640 x 480 which is standard definition, not HD video as advertised. Photos are fuzzy 640x480 as well. The advertising is very deceptive, but at this price, it probably should not be expected to have anything better than this.Since this is marketed as a video recorder, it would have been better to make it work only as a video recorder to avoid confusion. Logically, it should work this way. Press the power button, it's on. Press the record button, it starts recording. Press again, it stops. Press the power button again, it turns off. Had they made it this simple and marketed it as an SD recorder, it would be a great product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Fuzzy Video and Garbled Audio
Reviews.Author: R Peek
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for. It does take a video and it does have a screen capture feature.  Controls operate differently from barely readable instructions.  The drop shipping was fairly prompt.

Reviews.Title: Button camera
Reviews.Author: Ian bennett
Reviews.Content: this one game detached. the button section game apart. Can you rwplaced it? this is why i cant rate it.

Reviews.Title: don't buy this product
Reviews.Author: Von Ortiz
Reviews.Content: The first time I tried to put it in my button up shirt , the button feature of the camera came off . Please don't buy this product .  Not HD at all . Poor image quality and poor video quality .

Reviews.Title: terrible
Reviews.Author: christopher conley
Reviews.Content: you get what you paid for i dont even use it and it does not come with great directions either

Reviews.Title: Excellent product...good service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Received cam 32 days earlier than delivery date.  Camera works fine, and video quality is excellent.  Instructions are terrible, but if you will look on YouTube, there are plenty of reviews there to get you going.  The audio is loud, but that can be controlled through your video editor.  Good product at a bargain of a price.  All in all, I am extremely pleased with this product.

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: DEbbie Paukert
Reviews.Content: It stopped working the second time I tried to use it..Trash!, Garbage, Don't buy it as it will be a waste of money

Reviews.Title: Instructions written in very poor English, and are very difficult to understand.
Reviews.Author: Horatio Gavins "Voracious Reader"
Reviews.Content: Instructions written in very poor English, and are very difficult to understand. I have been unable to be confident of when the camera is recording, or not...

Reviews.Title: Didn't work, terrible instructions
Reviews.Author: Amy A
Reviews.Content: I don't believe this unit worked properly, but it is hard to know for sure considering the instructions are terrible!  You can tell it was originally written in a different language and translated to English because the sentences don't make a lot of sense.  It is very difficult to figure out how it works...that is IF it even works.

Reviews.Title: cool gadget
Reviews.Author: el vato
Reviews.Content: Its a very cool toy,I like very much and nobody knows when  I have it on me ,is an amazing gadget

Reviews.Title: instructions
Reviews.Author: Huck Hound "Huck"
Reviews.Content: This might be a "5 star" item but I haven't been able to use it yet.  The translated instructions are a joke.  If anyone has figured out what they really say, please post for thew rest of us.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Natself
Reviews.Content: It is good to use and easy to use for take some secret video,really good,really works well,and it is not expensive.

Reviews.Title: works ok
Reviews.Author: Timh
Reviews.Content: camera works good but you have to figure it out on your own the instructions come on such a small piece of paper you get up Dr magnifying glass to read it

Reviews.Title: Amazing product.
Reviews.Author: Stephen Guy
Reviews.Content: I notified someone that we were being recorded prior to a conversation, and he said something quietly that would not have been picked up by anything else.  This product is great.

Reviews.Title: thanks
Reviews.Author: john murphy
Reviews.Content: this camera is just what I needed  it realy gets the job done I will tell other people to get this if they need it

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: BAILEY ELLEY
Reviews.Content: Clear pictures, fine recording. I haven't had any problems with it for now. I like it and would recommended to those who likes to catch people stealing their cloth's.

Reviews.Title: good quality cam
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: Overall the quality of the cam is good. It came in a nice box that you can store the cam in . It hooks up to my computer with no problem it's just like plugging in a flash drive.  The only problem is the instructions are hard to understand, but if you email the seller he will send you better instruction

Reviews.Title: It sucks not impressed
Reviews.Author: David McCoy
Reviews.Content: Did not work at all does not hold the micro sd card in at all and will not power on even after trying to charge it over night not worth the money unsatisfied

Reviews.Title: It worked out very well
Reviews.Author: saurabh
Reviews.Content: It really worked out very well more than I actually expected . Picture quality is also very good . Had fun !!

Reviews.Title: Low video quality
Reviews.Author: FizZiKaL
Reviews.Content: The video footage is dark, the microphone is good, the instructions are confusing and poorly written. I don't know how long to charge this for to be fully charged.

Reviews.Title: Mini Spy HD DV CAMERA
Reviews.Author: cheery1516
Reviews.Content: This cam is a waste of money.  It is hard to understand the operating instructions.  The writing requires a high powered magnifier.  Then, it is even worse to learn how to playback video, if any, that is captured. Virtually useless without plain instruction on how to use athe cam and how to playback video. Would never recommend it as it is.

Reviews.Title: HD DV Camera camcorder
Reviews.Author: Delareesa Henry
Reviews.Content: It needs to be charge frequently. And it is hard to determine if it is in video recording mode sometime. Although the HD video recording works well.

Reviews.Title: Protect yourself!
Reviews.Author: Sandhills Complete Security
Reviews.Content: I work in the Private Investigation and Security industry. This is a must have! It takes excellent quality video and audio. Easy to use, tactile operation button. I just wish it came with other colored button heads, it's hard to find a shirt with just black buttons.

Reviews.Title: Waste of $$
Reviews.Author: JPT "John T."
Reviews.Content: Well....what can i say.  It was a piece of crap.  But you're really not going to find anything all that great at this price point, so I guess I should have expected it.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste money on this item.
Reviews.Author: Amstat
Reviews.Content: Instructions are ridiculous. The worst I have ever seen.  Will not focus. Construction is poor quality. I use a LOT of surveillance gear and this is the worst I have seen. The image quality is terrible.

Reviews.Title: I got them
Reviews.Author: gowens
Reviews.Content: I got them. It does exactly what it says it does. You tube has brief instructions on how to work it.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't even work
Reviews.Author: Chris L
Reviews.Content: I charged the item for the last 24 hours and still it only works if it is plugged in. I didn't get it to use it as a desk camera. WORTHLESS!!!

Reviews.Title: Cool Button Camera.....
Reviews.Author: Paul J. Atkinson
Reviews.Content: Cool mini camera.  Jave not used it yet but truly like tha design.... additional boutton tips would allow them to blend in different shirts better...

Reviews.Title: Merchandise return
Reviews.Author: Dave Roman
Reviews.Content: The instructions were printed so small, I needed a magnifying glass to see them. My wife suggested I scan it to MS Word and then enlarge it. I probably won't return it because it might cost more than the product is worth.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and not very cheerful
Reviews.Author: Mini spy cam
Reviews.Content: I found this mini cam to be not wat I had expected it to be..1)the volume was extreamly low and very hard to hear anything that had been recorded..2)the picture wasn't very good at all...if anyone is thinking about getting a mini cam you mite consider spending more time looking and from previous experience you probably need to spend about £100 otherwise you will be deeply disappointed when you try to look bk at wat you think you've recorded...

Reviews.Title: it is not working, just junk
Reviews.Author: movie2004
Reviews.Content: it is not working,  just junk  just junk, no light go on, no recording, not good a product.  just junk  just junk

Reviews.Title: great pic/vid
Reviews.Author: zavairavincent
Reviews.Content: base on that i seen a youtube vid of this cam. haven't gotten it in yet but i know it will be great cam to go into my spy closet. LOL

Reviews.Title: Strangly peculiar. a fun, tiny camera, etc.
Reviews.Author: Y.James
Reviews.Content: I'm working with the Tiny camera, that does everything. When I print out the photos and record video, I will leave more info.

Video Resolution: 720*480
Includes 4gb memory card.  Expandable to 16gb
Takes photos
Video frame rate: 30 FPS
ProductInfo.Name: 4GB Mini Spy Button Camera Hidden DVR Camcorder
